name: The Adventure of Lavaboy
description:
A platform game with three levels. You complete the game once you reach the end of the last level.  You get total of three lives.

Move lavaboy with arrow keys. 

Space to jump

Z to dash. Dash is enabled only when lavaboy is in the air.

Jump on the enemies to kill them

This is a game using OpenGL. You must have OpenGL set up in order to play it.
